meanings.definition: A person engaged in physical work, especially for wages.
meanings.sent1: The laborers harvested the crops under the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The construction site was bustling with laborers working diligently.
meanings.sent3: The laborers decided to have a race to see who could carry the most bricks.
meanings.sent4: The city was built on the sweat and toil of its laborers.
meanings.sent5: The laborers' calloused hands told the story of their hard work.

meanings.definition: To work hard; make great effort.
meanings.sent1: She laborers every day to provide for her family.
meanings.sent2: They laborers tirelessly to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel laborers to gather as many nuts as possible before winter.
meanings.sent4: He laborers away at his desk, focused on his task.
meanings.sent5: The ants laborers together to build their intricate underground tunnels.
